instruction: Formulate a comparison between two sports.
output: Soccer and basketball are two of the world's most popular sports. Soccer is a team game played on a large field, while basketball is an individual game played on a smaller court. Soccer relies more on strategy and teamwork, while basketball emphasizes individual skills such as dribbling and shooting. Both are fast-paced and entertaining sports to watch, but they appeal to different audiences and have their own unique features.
